body: sisters are gift from god to brothers. You have to cherish it and make a happy family with them. And those who let their sisters marry to strangers are complete cucks

I'm glad the sister was awake all the time. But still, molesting a girl in her sleep is not okay. It's even worse if it's your sister. You are supposed to love your sister, so make sure she is okay with you before you try to have sex with her. And never ever hurt her. Aside from that, it's a very sweet story. It is the purest truest love right here. They say love is when someone becomes special to you, but there is literally no girl more special than your sister.
This art style is refreshingly good
it was a good translation, not shitty.
